item.description:
This show will Star Mike Donovan & Pat Crawford

$18 @ the door.

People always come out of our comedy nights raving about how good the comedians are. It’s true that the comedians are that good. They should be. Most of our comedians have been on Letterman, Leno, Conan, and other programs. They are a riot!

MIKE DONOVAN
Mike has been a headlining stand-up comedian since 1978. Mike has appeared on SHOWTIME and has had his sports material featured on ESPN's SPORTSCENTER. He has toured 38 cities with Steven Wright and regularly appears in Las Vegas, N.Y., and Atlantic City.


 PAT NAPOLI
Pat has been doing comedy for 9 years now and has performed in almost every city in the Northeast. Pat always had the dream to become a great entertainer, unfortunately he went into comedy! He hasn't wasted any time in making a name for himself in Boston & other major metropolis' all over the country. His sharp observational humor makes him a popular favorite.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "MEETUP" sign on a table or call Dana @ (603)759-9876
item.name: Comedy night at the Tupelo Music Hall – BYOB Venue!!!
